channel.title: Bootstrap object on Redis Documentation Center
channel.description: Recent content in Bootstrap object on Redis Documentation Center

item.title: Cluster identity object
item.description: Name Type/Value Description name string Fully qualified cluster name. Limited to 64 characters and must comply with the IETF’s RFC 952 standard and section 2.1 of the RFC 1123 standard. nodes array of strings Array of IP addresses of existing cluster nodes wait_command boolean (default: true) Supports Redis wait command

item.title: Credentials object
item.description: Name Type/Value Description password string Admin password username string Admin username (pattern does not allow special characters &,<,>,")

item.title: Identity object
item.description: Name Type/Value Description uid integer Assumed node’s UID to join cluster. Used to replace a dead node with a new one. accept_servers boolean (default: true) If true, no shards will be created on the node addr string Internal IP address of node external_addr complex object External IP addresses of node. GET /jsonschema to retrieve the object’s structure. name string Node’s name override_rack_id boolean When replacing an existing node in a rack-aware cluster, allows the new node to be located in a different rack rack_id string Rack ID, overrides cloud config

item.title: Limits object
item.description: Name Type/Value Description max_listeners integer (default: 100) Max allowed listeners on node max_redis_servers integer (default: 100) Max allowed Redis servers on node

item.title: Node identity object
Paths object
item.description: Name Type/Value Description bigstore_path string Bigredis storage path ccs_persistent_path string Persistent storage path of CCS ephemeral_path string Ephemeral storage path persistent_path string Persistent storage path

item.title: Policy object
